MemoryInfobox.description: 'Having stolen riches form the temple of Athena, Followers of Ares spirited the loot away from the city. Kassandra found a letter written by a Follower speaking of the hidden valuables.'

General_Description: '''Athena, Ares, Me''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a [[Followers of Ares|Follower of Ares]], Kassandra discovered a note detailing the location of the zealot's valuables.
Section_Messages: *''Once I feared other gods, but now I know [[Ares]] will protect me. I stole riches from [[Athena]]'s temple for the Followers. The loot is far outside the city walls now.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
